Address.label: Address
Address.value: 4016 RAINTREE RD,,STE 300 STE 300, CHESAPEAKE, Virginia, 23321, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Greenwave Technology Solutions, Inc., through its wholly owned subsidiary Empire Services, Inc. ('Empire'), is an operator of 13 metal recycling facilities in Virginia, North Carolina, and Ohio. The Company's recycling facilities collect, classify, and process raw scrap metal (ferrous and nonferrous). Steel is one of the world's most recycled products with the ability to be re-melted and re-cast numerous times.
